messages.title: Dear resident
messages.content: As your MP, I have stood up to ministers and fought Teesside’s corner every day. You know I am not just another politician who turns up at election time making promises, only to disappear again after polling day. I have lived in Redcar for years and been an active, campaigning MP locally and in Westminster. My record fighting to defend industry, bring jobs, oppose Tory cuts to our schools and hospitals, protect the NHS, and support our steel industries’ stem shows I will always focus on the issues that matter. It is clear the Conservatives are aiming for a thumping majority in this election. Opinion polls suggest that this election is about who can provide the best protection for Redcar in Westminster and who stands up for you in Parliament.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Defending industry and fighting for jobs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will never stop defending our industries like steel and fighting for more decent well-paid jobs.
I will fight for a Brexit deal that is fair to Teesside, building on my work to protect our local industries and jobs from the impacts of Brexit.
I will defend our schools, our NHS, and our public services from harsh Tory cuts and ensure our local services get the funding and support they need.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Increasing national security and standing by our armed forces
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will never take risks with Britain's security and always support our armed forces and veterans.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Working for you all year round
keyPolicies.policyDescription: You know I'll work hard for Teesside all year round, not just at election time, and bring issues that matter to local people to Parliament.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It is clear the Conservatives are aiming for a thumping majority in this election. Opinion polls suggest that this election is about who can provide the best protection for Redcar in Westminster and who stands up for you in Parliament.

issues.brexitEurope: I will fight for a Brexit deal that is fair to Teesside, building on my work to protect our local industries and jobs from the impacts of Brexit.
issues.defence: Nothing matters more than the defence of our nation and our armed forces deserve the utmost respect for keeping us safe. I am proud to have worked with local service people, cadets and charities and I have had the honour to present military medals to brave veterans.
issues.economy: In two years I have challenged ministers in the House of Commons 302 times, asked over 100 written questions, and sent countless letters. Locally, I have supported 3000 people with individual problems and won back over £200,000. Imagine what we could achieve in five years?
issues.education: I will defend our schools and our public services from harsh Tory cuts and ensure our local services get the funding and support they need.
issues.health: I will defend our NHS from harsh Tory cuts and ensure our local services get the funding and support they need.
issues.labourEmployment: I will never stop defending our industries like steel and fighting for more decent well-paid jobs.
issues.lawCrime: Review sentences of dog cruelty pair says MP

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in Redcar for years and been an active, campaigning MP locally and in Westminster. My record fighting to defend industry, bring jobs, oppose Tory cuts to our schools and hospitals, protect the NHS, and support our steel industries’ stem shows I will always focus on the issues that matter.

endorsements.endorsement: Anna is a community-minded politician who cares and works hard to tackle local issues.

images.caption: YOUR LOCAL CHAMPION - Re-Elect Anna Turley. Keep our strong local voice for Redcar constituency.
I've made Teesside's voice heard loud and clear in two years I have challenged ministers in the House of Commons 302 times, asked over 100 written questions, and sent countless letters.
I will never stop fighting for local jobs - We have several big construction projects in the pipeline for Teesside.
Defending our nation and backing our troops - Nothing matters more than the defence of our nation.

I will never take risks with Britain's security and always support our armed forces and veterans.

Imagine what we could achieve in five years?
